What about this?

Whichever country wins the Euro, its Bernds have the right to vote for a ball another country will have to use for a day.

Example: Germany wins. German Bernds vote for France to wear a "white flag ball" for a day. Or Poland wins. Polelings vote for Russia wear an Ukraine ball for a day. Something like that.

Could make things exciting without crossing the line.

What do you think?

850th Birthday of Genghis Khan Bernd 2012-05-15 15:01:37.660732 Nr. 29270 [Antworten]
mn.PNG mn.PNG
PNG, 17x14, 278 bytes
mongol_empire.jpg mongol_empire.jpg
JPG, 1226x830, 335 kB

850 years ago, in 1162, a child was born who was destined to unite all the Mongols to take culture from China and Persia and bring culture to all the hapless slavs of Poland and Hungaria.
the Pax Mongolica, the greatest State known to man, stretched from China and Korea over to the Middle East and Russia, where the Mongol Hordes are still praised the greatest contributor to the local customs and local halpogroups, to the very soul of all the peoples living there.
>Great unity and unprecedented solidarity of all ethnic groups were realized in China.
-Chairman Hu Jintao
>Your lives are an example for all generations in our big multi-ethnic country, and your selfless brotherhood has given us a priceless inheritance. Over and over we thank you for making it possible for us to live and work in peace, create and dream, have children and grandchildren.
-President Vladimir Putin
In recognition of their valiant defence of their peculiar mongol traits of character from the vapid decadance seeping over from the rotten, merchantilist and culturally marxist West I-
>International forces are trying to Westernize and divide us by using ideology and culture.
-Chairman Hu Jintao
hereby suggest we celebrate his jubilee by adding mongolians balls to all the lands where proud mongol warriors have once had their pastures.

[Post gekürzt.]

I see. Country itself is mainly known from its greatest ruler - Tamerlane, whose vision was to ressurect the Mongol Empire to its former glory, damn even his army was similar if not the same as those of Genghis Khan.
As it was mostly known from him and everything fucked up after his death, I find it kinda strange to call it Timurid Dynasty, rather than the Timurid Empire (with such a names I met in EU-related games). But well, I leave it to decide up to you. Wikipedia is often misleading, remember about it. I will never forgive them for deleting a bunch of great Flags.

Anyway, corrected >>29283 a little. It would be such a waste to not consider adding some of them and let it die.

Hinweis / Notice
  1. Diese Site ist für Leute mit gesundem Menschenverstand und Humor gedacht, die mit Sarkasmus, Ironie und Zynismus umgehen können. Denk gründlich nach, bevor du etwas, das hier gepostet wurde, für bare Münze nimmst.
  2. Darüber hinaus enthält sie teilweise Dinge, die nur für ein erwachsenes Publikum geeignet sind. Wenn du minderjährig bist, geh bitte woanders hin.
  3. Bevor du hier irgendwas tust, mach dich mit den Regeln vertraut.
Glaubst du, das bekommst du hin? Ja | Nein
  1. This site is meant for people with common sense and humor who can deal with sarcasm, irony and cynicism. Think carefully before you take something that was posted here at face value.
  2. Furthermore, it contains some things that are only suitable for an adult audience. If you're a minor, please go somewhere else.
  3. Before you do anything here, familiarize yourself with the rules.
